title: Tom Bilyeu Meltdown Keynote 2017
description: This is a rebroadcast of Tom Bilyeu's keynote at Meltdown. Tom talks about his struggles with a fixed mindset, building himself to become an entrepreneur, and his mission to bring people out of the matrix. Topics include: *The concept of being a born entrepreneur *Finding your why and using it as a filter for your goals *How to manipulate your brain chemistry to feed your goals *Building a mindset around being a learner *The importance of intermittent fasting *Leveraging social media to build your business Tom Bilyeu is the co-founder of 2014 Inc. 500 company Quest Nutrition — a unicorn startup valued at over $1 billion — and the co-founder and host of Impact Theory. Impact Theory is a first-of-its-kind company designed to facilitate global change through the incubation of mission-based businesses and the cultivation of empowering content. Every piece of content Impact Theory creates is meant to underscore the company mission to free people from The Matrix and help them unlock their true potential. Impact Theory exists to inspire the next generation of game-changing companies and creators that will make a true and lasting impact on the world.
